Question.Subject: I accidentally changed my tab on IE8?
Question.Content: I downloaded a program to my computer (myHeritage) and it changed the screen tht opens up when i open a tab on Internet Explorer. How do i change it back to the way i had it? Specifically when I go to tools at the top of IE i go down to Internet Options and i click on settings under tabs. when it appears theres a drop down window that says the new tab page. how do i change that?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Go to "tools" in IE menu and open preferences, under the General Tab you will get the tab settings.. Clicking on that will open a new window where you can edit how a new tab should open. All the best

Answer.Content: Go to "tools" in IE menu and open preferences, under the General Tab you will get the tab settings.. Clicking on that will open a new window where you can edit how a new tab should open. All the best
